commit message: Implement new TopExceptionHandler, allow user to disable error reporting in preferences either completely or only until the next update is installed.

Issue 215: Labels are not scrollable
- Attemt to improve the labels dialog, add scrolling and sorting of labels
Rename frames from left/right to main/sub

- Renamed some layout files and view to better outline their function
- Added frame_sub to main layout so we don't have to bother with choosing the right view for the feed-list anymore
- Removed lots of old code which was only necessary to handle rotation with these complicated layout changes
- Fixed empty lists when going back after rotating the screen
- Fixed back stack records and removed unused code

== Version 1.72 ==
* Implemented better error reporting mechanism
* Modified tablet layout, reduced complexity of code
* Bugfixes
